org.xlattice.corexml.om

Class Attr

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.corexml.om.Node
      • org.xlattice.corexml.om.Attr

  • public class Attr
extends Node
    XML attribute, either a triplet (prefix, name, value) or a pair (name, value). The prefixed form is a 'colonized' string like "prefix:name", where colonized means 'containing a colon'. As required by the XML standard, neither prefix nor name may contain a colon. In the actual XML, the value will be doubly (") or singly (') quoted.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon
